result.execSummary:
All charges against Deandre Excel Brown in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Deandre Excel Brown is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deandre Excel Brown

records.addlTxt: Defendant Deandre Excel Brown not in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas J McClure Esq in court for Deandre Excel Brown.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for State of Wisconsin. State's essential witness is NOT present in court, therefore, the State is unable to proceed today.  No alternative theory.  Motion to dismiss by the defense argued and GRANTED by the Court.  Case dismissed without prejudice.
Defendant's Motion in Limine for Trial, received and filed.
3rd Amended Defendant's Witness List, received and filed
Amended Defendant's Witness List, received and filed

Defendant Deandre Excel Brown in court.  Attorney Thomas J McClure Esq appeared by video for Deandre Excel Brown.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Case in court for final pretrial. Joinder motion heard for cases 2020CF2430 and 2022CF1930. Court grants joinder. Final Pretrial held. Case remains in trial posture. Case remains calendared for Jury Trial, Branch 4.
Defendant's Witness List, received and filed

Defendant Deandre Excel Brown appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas J McClure Esq appeared by video for Deandre Excel Brown.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defense advises of witness and request status date before trial. Court sets additional final pretrial. Court orders defendant held for next court date. Case adjourned in Branch 4.
Final pre-trial scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Deandre Excel Brown not in court, in custody.  Attorney Thomas J McClure Esq in court for Deandre Excel Brown.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for State of Wisconsin. Court addressed withdrawal of prior counsel. Case remains calendared in Branch 4. Court to address joinder motion at next hearing. Final pre-trial scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 08:30 am. Jury trial date of 9/19/2022 remains.

State requested Identification Motion be heard at the jury trial date. Court granted. Motion to be heard on jury trial date. Case adjourned for final pre-trial in Branch 04.

OUT OF COURT EYEWITNESS IDENTIFICATION.
Motion to Join 20CF2430 and 22CF1930 for Jury Trial.

State's Motion in Limine, received and filed.

Attorney Sarah Zwach in court, defendant Deandre Excel Brown not in court, in custody.  Daniel T Flaherty appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Defense requests identification motion hearing. State request joinder and  trial dates on cases 2020CF2430 and 2022CF1930. Parties motions due on 7-1-2022. Replies by 7-15-2022. Any response due by 7-29-2022. Court advises defense that defendant's pro se motions are not accepted by court when represented by counsel and to advise client. Motions to be heard on same motion date. Case remains calendared in Branch 4.  Motion hearing scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 03:30 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Deandre Excel Brown in court with Attorney Sarah Zwach; both appear by video.  Defendant Deandre Excel Brown in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective M. Martin. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 04.  Status conference scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Received and filed.
Received and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring.   24 hour curfew.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with: DRB (04/12/2015) and Crystal D L

Defendant Deandre Excel Brown in court with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Defendant Deandre Excel Brown in custody.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deandre Excel Brown appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
